EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Pivotal Breakfast_Melbourne_Q119.Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining us for breakfast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you very much for taking the time to join us for breakfast. Should you wish to revisit any of the content shared or learn more about what we do, please find some available resources below:
- View the slides presented at the event: https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Pivotal_AU_Breakfast_Slides_02.04.19.pdf - Register for the live webinar 'Build Your Multi-Cloud Strategy and Avoid Cloud Lock-in' featuring Shaun Norris, CIO APJ, Pivotal: https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-29-build-your-multi-cloud-strategy-and-avoid-cloud-lock-in-webinar - Read the blog 'My DevOps Reading List': https://content.pivotal.io/blog/my-devops-reading-list - Contact us to speak directly with your local Pivot: https://pivotal.io/contact
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
